'''Minecraft Pack Teaser Trailer''' is a trailer promoting the release of {{MC}} content in [[Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds|''Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds'']]. The video serves as a tongue-in-cheek prologue, explaining how the ''Minecraft'' representatives made it into the game.

== Summary ==
One day, [[Steve]] is riding in a [[minecart]] across from a [[village]], but is distraught when they realize it's slower than a [[pig]]. The minecart comes to a screeching halt in despair, until Steve has an idea. Steve begins building, using an [[iron axe]] and the apparently still alive head of the [[ender dragon]], constructing a [[scaffolding]] rollercoaster. At the end is a giant [https://sonic.fandom.com/wiki/Travel_Ring travel ring], constructed out of [[Block of Gold|gold]]. Alex watches, expressing some ambiguous emotion over this development, as Steve launches off a ramp into another world, in the process destroying the scaffolding.
